35 #include <lidar_segmentation/lidar_segmentation.h>
36 #include <lidar_segmentation/clustering.h>
37 #include "calibration/visualization_rviz_swissranger.h"
38 #include <vector>
39 
45 vector<visualization_msgs::Marker> createTargetMarkers(pcl::PointXYZ sphereCenter )
46 {
47 
48  static Markers marker_list;
49 
50  //Reduce the elements status, ADD to REMOVE and REMOVE to delete
51  marker_list.decrement();
52 
53  visualization_msgs::Marker marker_sphere;
54 
55  marker_sphere.header.frame_id = "/my_frame";
56  marker_sphere.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
57 
58  marker_sphere.ns = "sphere";
59  marker_sphere.action = visualization_msgs::Marker::ADD;
60 
61  marker_sphere.type = visualization_msgs::Marker::SPHERE_LIST;
62 
63  marker_sphere.scale.x = 0.9;
64  marker_sphere.scale.y = 0.9;
65  marker_sphere.scale.z = 0.9;
66 
67 
68  //sphere
69 
70  if(sphereCenter.x!=0)
71  {
72  geometry_msgs::Point pt;
73  pt.x=sphereCenter.x;
74  pt.y=sphereCenter.y;
75  pt.z=sphereCenter.z;
76  marker_sphere.points.push_back(pt);
77  marker_sphere.color.a=1;
78  marker_sphere.color.g=1;
79 
80  marker_list.update(marker_sphere);
81  }
82 
83  //Remove markers that should not be transmitted
84  marker_list.clean();
85 
86  //Clean the marker_vector and put new markers in it;
87  return marker_list.getOutgoingMarkers();
88 
89 } //end function
